00019   {
00020     _effNpix = saturationParameters->getNpix();

00029   /************************************************
00030    deSaturate
00031   ************************************************/
00032   float Ahc2SatCorr::deSaturate( const float saturatedSignal ) const
00033   {
00034     
00035     /*  protect against negative/zero input*/
00036     if ( saturatedSignal <= 0 ) return saturatedSignal;
00037 
00038     /* linearisation threshold */
00039     const float ratio = 0.95;
00040 
00041     if(saturatedSignal < ratio * _effNpix)
00042       {
00043         /* desaturate using inverse function */
00044         float unSaturatedSignal = - _effNpix * TMath::Log(1 - saturatedSignal / _effNpix);
00045         return unSaturatedSignal;
00046       }
00047     else
00048       {
00049         /* desaturate using linear continuation function for hits above linearisation threshold */
00050         float unSaturatedSignal = 1/( 1 - ratio ) * (saturatedSignal - ratio * _effNpix) - _effNpix * TMath::Log( 1 - ratio );
00051         return unSaturatedSignal;
00052       }
00053 
00054   }
00055 
00056 
00057 
00058   /************************************************
00059    deSaturatedError
00060   ************************************************/
00061   float Ahc2SatCorr::deSaturatedError( const float saturatedSignal,
00062                                        const float saturatedSignalError ) const
00063   {
00064     /*  relative error same as input*/
00065     return saturatedSignalError / saturatedSignal
00066       * deSaturate( saturatedSignal );
00067   }
00068 
00069 
00070   /************************************************
00071    saturate
00072   ************************************************/
00073   float Ahc2SatCorr::saturate( const float unSaturatedSignal ) const
00074   {
00075     /*  protect against negative/zero input*/
00076     if ( unSaturatedSignal <= 0 ) return unSaturatedSignal;
00077 
00078     /* calculate saturated signal using simple exponential formula */
00079     float saturatedSignal = _effNpix * ( 1. - TMath::Exp( - unSaturatedSignal / _effNpix ) );
00080 
00081     return saturatedSignal;
00082   }
00083 
00084 
00085   /************************************************
00086    saturatedError
00087   ************************************************/
00088   float Ahc2SatCorr::saturatedError( const float unSaturatedSignal,
00089                                      const float unSaturatedSignalError ) const
00090   {
00091     /*  relative error same as input*/
00092     return unSaturatedSignalError / unSaturatedSignal
00093       * saturate( unSaturatedSignal );
00094   }
00095   
00096 }  /* namespace CALICE */
